returns slowest for negative level

each type has exactly 4 rotation states
I and O use 4x4 matrices

each shape has exactly 4 filled cells

I wall kick has all 8 transitions
first offset is always [0,0] (no kick)
I mino uses different offsets than JLSTZ
returns I kick data for I mino
returns JLSTZ kick data for other minos
